articles.author: Universe Today
articles.title: Early Life on Mars May've Wiped Out Early Life on Mars, a New Study Suggests - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Life might have wiped itself out on early Mars.
articles.content:
Life might have wiped itself out on early Mars. That's not as absurd as it sounds; that's sort of what happened on Earth.
But life on Earth evolved and persisted, while on Mars, it didn't.
Evidence… [+10496 chars]

articles.title: China moon mission samples upend theories of lunar volcanism - Space.com
